frame.name: Attention_getting
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame covers terms used to get someone's attention, including <fen>Interjection</fen>s (e.g. <ment>hey</ment>, <ment>yo</ment>) and certain terms of address (<fen>Address_term</fen>), the latter of which may serve the function of attention getting.
<ex><fex name="Interj"><t>Hey</t></fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Interj">Hey</fex>, <fex name="Add_t">boy</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Interj">Hey</fex>, <fex name="Add_t">boy</fex>, come over here now!</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Address_term
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Address_term</fen> as used to get someone's attention, and may be a proper name. <ex><fex name="Add_t">Boy</fex>, come over here right now!</ex> <ex><fex name="Add_t">Billy</fex>, come over here right now!</ex>
Tag this constiuent with the FE <fen>Interjection</fen> on a secondary FE layer.
</def-root>

FE.name: Interjection
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Interjection</fen> identifies the attention getting element. <ex><fex name="Interj">Hey</fex>, boy, come over here now!</ex></def-root>
